          <title>
            <string language="en">OR gate operation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ODER Gatteroperation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">OU exécution de porte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">OU operação da porta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">O funzionamento del cancello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η λειτουργία πυλών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">U operación de la puerta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an OR gate which requires atleast one of or both inputs be on for the gate to be on.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chips</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">circuit elements</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">logic gates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">OR gates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">output</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">symbols</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benötigt von, diese Abbildung dar daß stellt, 
ODER Gatter welchem atleast eins oder beide Input eingeschaltet sind, 
damit das Gatter eingeschaltet ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que OU la porte de ce 
qu'exige l'atleast un ou les deux entrées soit allumée pour que la 
porte soit allumée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que OU a porta qual 
requer o atleast um ou ambas as entradas sejam sobre para que a porta 
seja sobre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che O il cancello di 
quale richiede il atleast uno o entrambi gli input è sopra affinchè 
il cancello sia sopra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει Η πύλη που απαιτούν 
atleast μια από ή και οι δύο είσοδοι είναι ανοικτές για την 
πύλη να.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que O la puerta cuál 
requiere el atleast uno o ambas entradas de información esté 
encendido para que esté la puerta encendido.</string>
          </description>
